description:
Note: This application is for Webos versions 1.4.5 and below.
Easy Dial List is a speed dial application that keeps easy in the name and the structure of the application. It is a one-stop shop for all of your speed dial needs and allows you to access contact numbers quickly and easily. It also allows you to send an SMS message to any mobile phone numbers in the list by touching the messaging icon on the right of the easy contact. It is easy to add contacts and just as easy to delete them. You can add an easy contact to the list for a weekend and delete it later so your list is kept short and easy. Of course Easy Dial List can hold many contacts, you just have to flick to scroll down the list and select the easy contact you desire. 
Features are:
-	Update! You can now edit the Easy Contact display name (either initially when added or using the Main App Menu item)
-	Tap the middle of the easy contact to dial the preferred number
-	Tap "+Add New" to add from your Contacts
-	Edit your Easy Contact display name and select the preferred number
-	Swipe to the side to delete an easy contact from the list
-	Tap, hold, and move to reorder the easy contact
-	Tap the messaging symbol on the right hand side of the easy contact to send a SMS message to that number
-	Tap the easy contact picture icon and you can get fuller listing of your easy contacts phone numbers, email addresses, and IM accounts that you had stored in your contact app when the easy contact was added. 

Note: If information changes in your Contacts, you just need to swipe to delete the easy contact and easily add it back.
